subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Former employees of an anti-aging clinic and others with ties to it told investigators that the Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez arranged to buy documents from the clinic, according to two people briefed on the case.
snippet: Former employees of an anti-aging clinic and others with ties to it told investigators that the Yankees’ Alex Rodriguez arranged to buy documents from the clinic, according to two people briefed on the case.
